In der Dunkelheit deiner Gedanken m√∂chte ich das Licht sein.
In the darkness of your thoughts, I would like to be the light.
Trying to do the next right thing.
Be happy givers.
#DoGoodToday
We do not cede territory to the enemy. Eventually we'll run out of places & people & ideas to walk away from, and have nothing and nowhere to go to.

We defy augury.

fields.name: Do Good with Me

fields.name: the deepest and most meaningful arrangement of words I've ever come up with
fields.value: Expect the worst and assume the best and accept what is.
